description.english: Kill one guard.
description.french: Tue un garde.
description.german: Töte eine Wache.
description.italian: Uccidi una guardia.
description.japanese: 守衛を1人倒せ。
description.spanish: Mata a un guardia.

description.english: Save Azai from the mercenaries.
description.french: Sauve Azaï des griffes des mercenaires.
description.german: Rette Azai vor den Söldnern.
description.italian: Salva Azai dai mercenari.
description.japanese: Azaiを傭兵たちから救い出せ。
description.spanish: Protege a Azai de los mercenarios.

description.english: Assassinate Kelly, the mercenary captain.
description.french: Assassine Kelly, le capitaine des mercenaires.
description.german: Ermorde Kelly, den Hauptmann der Söldner.
description.italian: Uccidi Kelly, il capitano dei mercenari.
description.japanese: 傭兵大尉のKellyを暗殺する。
description.spanish: Asesina a Kelly, el capitán mercenario.

description.english: Assassinate Karajan.
description.french: Assassine Karajan.
description.german: Bring Karajan um.
description.italian: Uccidi Karajan.
description.japanese: Karajanを暗殺せよ。
description.spanish: Asesina a Karajan.

description.english: Escape from the Stronghold.
description.french: Échappe-toi de la forteresse.
description.german: Flieh aus der Festung.
description.italian: Scappa dalla fortezza.
description.japanese: 敵の本拠地から脱出せよ。
description.spanish: Huye de la fortaleza.

description.english: Determine your fate.
description.french: Détermine ton destin.
description.german: Bestimme dein Schicksal.
description.italian: Sii artefice del tuo destino.
description.japanese: 自分の運命を決めよ。
description.spanish: Determina tu destino.

description.english: Complete the game in New Game Plus.
description.french: Termine le jeu en Nouvelle partie plus.
description.german: Beende das Spiel in New Game Plus.
description.italian: Completa il gioco come nuova partita plus.
description.japanese: ニューゲームプラスでゲームをクリアする。
description.spanish: Completa el juego en New Game Plus.

description.english: Earn three stars in every level.
description.french: Gagne trois étoiles dans chaque niveau.
description.german: Hol dir in jedem Level drei Sterne.
description.italian: Ottieni tre stelle in ogni livello.
description.japanese: すべてのレベルで星3つを獲得する。
description.spanish: Obtén tres estrellas en cada nivel.

description.english: Earn all the Seals in every level.
description.french: Gagne les trois sceaux sur chaque niveau.
description.german: Hol dir alle drei Siegel in jedem Level.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti e tre i sigilli in ogni livello.
description.japanese: 各レベルで3つのシールを獲得する。
description.spanish: Gana los tres sellos en todos los niveles.

description.english: Find all three scrolls in every level.
description.french: Trouve les trois rouleaux sur chaque niveau.
description.german: Finde alle drei Rollen in jedem Level.
description.italian: Trova tutti i rotoli in ogni livello.
description.japanese: 各レベルで3本の巻物を見つける。
description.spanish: Encuentra los tres pergaminos en todos los niveles.

description.english: Earn all the upgrades.
description.french: Gagne toutes les améliorations.
description.german: Hol dir alle Upgrades.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti i potenziamenti.
description.japanese: すべてのアップグレードを獲得する。
description.spanish: Consigue todas las mejoras.

description.english: Complete a level without killing any guards.
description.french: Termine un niveau sans tuer de garde.
description.german: Beende einen Level, ohne eine Wache zu töten.
description.italian: Completa un livello senza uccidere neanche una guardia.
description.japanese: 守衛を殺さずにレベルをクリアする。
description.spanish: Completa un nivel sin matar a ningún guardia.

description.english: Complete a level without getting detected.
description.french: Termine un niveau sans te faire repérer.
description.german: Beende einen Level, ohne entdeckt zu werden.
description.italian: Completa un livello senza essere scoperto.
description.japanese: 敵に一度も気づかれることなくレベルをクリア。
description.spanish: Completa un nivel sin que te descubran.

description.english: Complete a level without killing any guards and without being detected.
description.french: Termine un niveau sans tuer de garde et sans te faire détecter.
description.german: Beende einen Level, ohne eine Wache zu töten und ohne entdeckt zu werden.
description.italian: Completa un livello senza uccidere neanche una guardia e senza essere individuato.
description.japanese: 守衛を殺さず、さらに見つからずにレベルをクリアする。
description.spanish: Completa un nivel sin matar a los guardias y sin ser detectado.

description.english: Complete all of the challenge rooms.
description.french: Termine toutes les salles de défi.
description.german: Beende alle Herausforderungsräume
description.italian: Completa tutte le stanze della sfida.
description.japanese: チャレンジ・ルームをすべてクリアする。
description.spanish: Completa todas las salas de desafíos.

description.english: Terrorize 10 guards.
description.french: Terrorise 10 gardes.
description.german: Erschrecke 10 Wachen.
description.italian: Terrorizza 10 guardie.
description.japanese: 10人の守衛を怖がらせる。
description.spanish: Aterroriza a 10 guardias.

description.english: Distract 25 guards using your equipment.
description.french: Distrais 25 gardes en utilisant ton équipement.
description.german: Lenke 25 Wachen mit deiner Ausrüstung ab.
description.italian: Distrai 25 guardie utilizzando il tuo equipaggiamento.
description.japanese: 装備を使って25人の守衛の注意をそらす。
description.spanish: Distrae a 25 guardias usando su equipo.

description.english: Distract 25 guards using environmental objects.
description.french: Distrais 25 gardes en utilisant des objets de l’environnement.
description.german: Lenke 25 Wachen mit Gegenständen aus der Umgebung ab.
description.italian: Distrai 25 guardie utilizzando oggetti presenti nell'ambiente circostante.
description.japanese: 周囲の物品を使って25人の守衛の注意をそらす。
description.spanish: Distrae a 25 guardias con objetos del entorno.

description.english: Perform 25 successful stealth kills.
description.french: Effectue 25 mises à mort furtives.
description.german: Führe 25 Mal erfolgreich geräuschloses Töten durch.
description.italian: Esegui con successo 25 uccisioni furtive.
description.japanese: ステルス・キルを25回成功させる。
description.spanish: Mata 25 veces de forma sigilosa.

description.english: Perform five different types of stealth kills successfully in one level.
description.french: Effectue cinq types de mises à mort furtives différentes dans un niveau.
description.german: Führe fünf verschiedene Arten des geräuschlosen Tötens in einem Level aus.
description.italian: Esegui cinque diversi tipi di uccisioni furtive in un unico livello.
description.japanese: 1つのレベルで5種類のステルス・キルを成功させる。
description.spanish: Realiza cinco tipos diferentes de muertes sigilosas en un nivel.

description.english: Kill a guard from inside the box.
description.french: Tue un garde depuis l’intérieur de la boîte.
description.german: Töte eine Wache aus der Schachtel heraus.
description.italian: Uccidi una guardia dall'interno di uno scatolo di cartone.
description.japanese: 箱のなかから守衛を殺す。
description.spanish: Mata a un guardia desde dentro de la caja.

description.english: Get the Undetected honor bonus 10 times in one level.
description.french: Obtiens 10 fois le bonus Non détecté sur un niveau.
description.german: Erhalte in einem Level 10 Mal den Nicht-Entdeckt-Bonus.
description.italian: Ottieni il bonus Inosservato 10 volte in un unico livello.
description.japanese: 1つのレベルで隠密ボーナスを10回獲得する。
description.spanish: Obtén 10 veces en un mismo nivel la bonificación por no ser detectado.

displayName.french: Il ne peut pas être inaperçu

description.english: Throw the body of one guard to terrorize another.
description.french: Jette le corps d’un garde pour en terroriser un autre.
description.german: Wirf einer Wache eine Leiche vor die Füße, um sie in Schrecken zu versetzen.
description.italian: Lancia il cadavere di una guardia per terrorizzarne un'altra.
description.japanese: 1人の守衛の死体を投げて別の守衛を怖がらせる。
description.spanish: Tira el cadáver de un guardia para aterrorizar a otro.

description.english: Within a single Focus, aim and throw three different types of items.
description.french: Avec une seule Concentration, vise et lance trois différents types d’objets.
description.german: Ziele und werfe auf drei verschiedene Gegenstände innerhalb eines Fokussierens.
description.italian: All'interno di una singola concentrazione, mira e lancia tre diversi tipi di oggetti.
description.japanese: 1回のフォーカスで、3種類のアイテムの照準を設定して投げる。
description.spanish: Durante una sola concentración, apunta y lanza tres tipos diferentes de objetos.

description.english: Stealth kill an elite guard after stunning him.
description.french: Tue furtivement un garde d’élite après l’avoir étourdi.
description.german: Töte eine Elite-Wache geräuschlos, nachdem du sie betäubt hast.
description.italian: Uccidi furtivamente una guardia d'elite dopo averla stordita.
description.japanese: 親衛隊1人の動きを止めてからステルス・キルする。
description.spanish: Mata sigilosamente a un guardia de élite después de aturdirlo.

description.english: Stealth kill a guard from inside a dumpster.
description.french: Tue furtivement un garde depuis l’intérieur d’une benne.
description.german: Töte eine Wache geräuschlos aus einer Mülltonne heraus.
description.italian: Uccidi furtivamente una guardia dall'interno di un cassonetto dei rifiuti.
description.japanese: ゴミ箱の中から守衛をステルス・キルする。
description.spanish: Mata sigilosamente a un guardia desde un contenedor.

description.english: Kill a guard by getting other guards to shoot them.
description.french: Tue un garde en le faisant abattre par d’autres gardes.
description.german: Töte eine Wache, indem du die anderen dazu bringst, sie selbst zu erschießen.
description.italian: Fai in modo che una guardia venga uccisa dai suoi compagni.
description.japanese: 守衛に他の守衛を撃たせて殺す。
description.spanish: Mata a un guardia haciendo que otros guardias le disparen.

description.english: Terrify a guard and cause him to stumble to his death.
description.french: Terrifie un garde et fais-le trébucher vers sa mort.
description.german: Versetze eine Wache so in Schrecken, dass sie sich selbst in den Tod stürzt.
description.italian: Fai in modo che una guardia muoia per una caduta dopo averla terrorizza.
description.japanese: 守衛を怖がらせて転ばせ、死に至らしめる。
description.spanish: Aterroriza a un guardia y mátale haciéndole tropezar.

description.english: Terrify a guard using the result of a hanging stealth kill five times.
description.french: Terrifie un garde avec cinq mises à mort furtives suspendues.
description.german: Versetze eine Wache fünf Mal mit geräuschlos durch Hängen Getöteten in Schrecken.
description.italian: Terrorizza una guardia per impiccagione con un'uccisione furtiva cinque volte.
description.japanese: 守衛を怖がらせて上からのステルス・キルで殺す（5回）。
description.spanish: Aterroriza a un guardia cinco veces colgando a otro matado sigilosamente.

description.english: Use a dead body to lure another guard and then stealth kill them.
description.french: Utilise un cadavre pour attirer un autre gardien et tue-le furtivement.
description.german: Benutze eine Leiche, um eine andere Wache anzulocken und töte sie geräuschlos.
description.italian: Usa un cadavere per attirare un'altra guardia e quindi uccidila furtivamente.
description.japanese: 死体を使って守衛を誘い出し、ステルス・キルで殺す。
description.spanish: Usa un cadáver para atraer a otro guardia y mátalo sigilosamente.

description.english: Complete the new Special Edition level.
description.german: Schließe den neuen Spezialausgabe-Level ab.
description.french: Termine le niveau inédit Édition Spéciale.
description.italian: Completa il nuovo livello in edizione speciale.
description.spanish: Completa el nuevo nivel de la edición especial.
description.japanese: 新しい特別版のレベルをクリアしろ。

description.english: Stun an elite guard with moths then dispatch him.
description.german: Betäube eine Elitewache mit Motten und erledige sie.
description.french: Assomme une garde d'élite avec des papillons de nuit, puis abats-le.
description.italian: Stordisci la guardia d'elite con le falene e poi sbarazzatene.
description.spanish: Atonta a un guardia de élite con polillas y liquídalo.
description.japanese: 親衛隊の一員を蛾で惑わせ、素早く殺せ。

description.english: View any of the developer commentaries.
description.german: Sieh dir einen Entwickler-Kommentar an.
description.french: Voir tous les commentaires des développeurs.
description.italian: Visualizza uno qualsiasi dei commenti dello sviluppatore.
description.spanish: Ver cualquiera de los comentarios de los programadores.
description.japanese: どれでもすきな開発者解説を見る。

displayName.french: De retour au lit avec toi

description.english: Knock out an enemy again that was revived from being knocked out.
description.german: Schlage einen Feind erneut K.o., der nach seinem ersten K.o. wiederbelebt wurde.
description.french: Remets K.O. un ennemi qui s'est réveillé d'un K.O.
description.italian: Atterra di nuovo un nemico che è stato rianimato dopo essere stato abbattuto.
description.spanish: Vuelve a noquear a un enemigo que ha sido reanimado después de ser noqueado.
description.japanese: 一旦倒した後に蘇生した敵をもう一度倒せ。

description.english: Complete one of the original Mark of the Ninja levels using the Path of Wisdom.
description.german: Schließe einen Originallevel von Mark of the Ninja ab und benutze dabei den Pfad der Weisheit.
description.french: Termine un des niveaux originels de Mark of the Ninja en utilisant le Chemin de la Sagesse.
description.italian: Completa uno dei livelli originali di Mark of the Ninja usando il cammino della saggezza.
description.spanish: Completa uno de los niveles originales de Mark of the Ninja usando la senda de la sabiduría.
description.japanese: 知恵の道を使って、オリジナルの「Mark of the Ninja」のレベルを１つ、完了せよ。

description.english: Dispatch two enemies at once using a body infected with Toxic Fungus.
description.german: Erledige zwei Feinde gleichzeitig, indem du eine mit giftigen Pilzen verseuchte Leiche benutzt.
description.french: Abats deux ennemis à la fois en utilisant un corps infecté de champignons toxiques.
description.italian: Sbarazzati di due nemici in un colpo solo usando un cadavere infettato con il fungo tossico.
description.spanish: Liquida a dos enemigos a la vez usando un cuerpo infectado con hongos tóxicos.
description.japanese: 毒キノコに冒された体を使って、敵を２体同時に倒せ。

displayName.spanish: Bueno a mí me parece interesante
displayName.japanese: まぁ、『私』は面白いと思うけれど

description.english: Read one of the history lesson developer commentaries.
description.german: Lies einen der Entwickler-Kommentare zum geschichtlichen Hintergrund.
description.french: Lis un des commentaires de développeurs sur les leçons d'histoire.
description.italian: Leggi uno dei commenti dello sviluppatore.
description.spanish: Lee uno de los comentarios de los programadores sobre la historia.
description.japanese: 歴史レッスンの開発者解説を見る。

description.english: Disable a spotlight using the Dusk Moths.
description.german: Schalte mit Dämmerungsmotten einen Scheinwerfer aus.
description.french: Désactive un projecteur utilisant les papillons du crépuscule.
description.italian: Blocca una fonte di luce mediante le falene del crepuscolo.
description.spanish: Desactiva un foco usando polillas nocturnas.
description.japanese: 夕闇蛾を使ってスポットライトを無効にする。
